category-graphic-design.description: An organization may have dedicated design resources, outsource to independent contractors on a per-project basis, or may need to be done by developer relations roles themselves.

category-technical-writing.description: Tools that support teams with technical writing. This is inclusive of documentation and blogging solutions for creating tutorials, blog posts, etc.

category-public-speaking.description: Tools that support public speaking. This is inclusive of presentation software, slide decks, and other devices used to create and deliver presentations.

category-user-experience.description: Tools that can help support defining or understanding user experience. This includes designing user interfaces and mockups as well as collecting feedback from users.

category-developer-marketing.description: Tools that can help support developer marketing activities. This includes content management systems, website builders, and other tools used to create and manage marketing websites (including Developer Portals).

category-web-development.description: Tools used for web development. This includes static site generators, content management systems, and other tools used to create and manage websites.

category-video-production.description: Tools used for the production of audio and video media. This includes video editing software, screen recording tools, and other tools used to create and manage video content.

category-social-media.description: Tools that are used for managing online communities through social media including scheduling posts, managing accounts, analyzing performance, etc.

category-community-management.description: Tools used for managing online communities, forums, and discussion boards.

situation-need-imagery.description: The situation is one where imagery is needed to support a project.
situation-need-imagery.const: want imagery to support a project

situation-manage-docs.description: Whether setting up docs from scratch or existing documentation to migrate for a project, this situation requires a tool to help with documentation management.

situation-manage-website.description: The situation is one where a website needs to be created or managed, such as a Developer Portal or other marketing site using content management systems and website builders.

situation-host-production.description: The situation is one where a program or event needs to be hosted, such as a live stream, webinar, or virtual event.

situation-need-instructions.description: The situation is one where documentation needs to be written or edited to explain how to accomplish a goal.

situation-manage-social-media.description: The situation is one where social media accounts need to be managed, such as scheduling posts, engaging with the audience, and analyzing performance.
situation-manage-social-media.const: want to manage social media accounts

situation-want-online-community.description: The situation where an online community needs to be built or managed.
situation-want-online-community.const: want to build an online community

motivation-make-information-clearer.description: A picture to complement other information can help make relationships and structure much more clear.

motivation-create-visual-identity.description: A collection of visual elements can be reused by others for various purposes.

motivation-make-information-engaging.description: A polished experience with visual elements can grab a user's attention to make it more engaging and emphasize ideas, manage flow through a page, or identify similar items within visual groupings.

motivation-visualize-idea.description: Capture complex or abstract ideas into something visual that helps others imagine what a thing might look like.

motivation-organize-knowledge.description: Organize knowledge in a way that is easy to understand and navigate.

motivation-clear-communication.description: Ensure that the quality of the writing meets the standards required for understanding and clarity.

motivation-internal-collaboration.description: A tool that helps with collaboration, so that multiple team members can work together on a project, share ideas, and provide feedback.

motivation-external-contributors.description: A tool that allows for external contributors, so that the community can help with documentation, tutorials, or other content.

motivation-reuse-spec-and-inline-documen.description: Inline documentation or specifications from source-code is a way to document code directly within the codebase, and allows for reuse in generating user documentation.

motivation-deliver-marketing-messages.description: A tool that helps deliver marketing messages and positioning, so that the company can effectively communicate its value proposition to developers.

outcome-create-infographics.description:
Infographics can convey complex information visually which aids with understanding. It may convey graphically relationships between objects, quantitative information summarized, etc.

This may include architecture diagrams, dataflow diagrams, E-R diagrams, and similar development-oriented tasks.

outcome-create-graphics.description: Graphic design assets unite a brand to tell a story and may take many forms such as page dividers, social banners, in-page graphic elements, etc.

outcome-create-logo.description: The company logo and variations of it are central to the design system of a product. There are tools that help specifically to design and edit logos.

outcome-create-avatar.description: The individual person or company mascot provides a personification of a brand in the form of an avatar.

outcome-create-mockup.description: A mockup helps convey interactions and visual elements that must be constructed by others in either low fidelity or full design elements to help understand the scope of work.

outcome-create-tutorial.description: Created a tutorial that helps explain how to accomplish a goal or task, such as how-to guides with step-by-step instructions. May be a blog, documentation page, workshop, or video.

outcome-create-guide.description: Create a conceptual guide that explains from first principles how to accomplish tasks within a domain. This typically includes a fair amount of background that is explained progressively for greater understanding compared to tutorials or reference documentation that may more directly intend to address a question.

outcome-create-api-ref.description: Create an API reference that explains the input parameters and output responses of a developer-facing API. This can be done with typical documentation tools but may also be generated from the specificiation for a dynamic or interactive experience.

outcome-create-website.description: Create a website to explain what the product or service offerred is. This includes static websites, progressive web-apps, or output from a CMS.

outcome-create-video-tutorial.description: Similar to tutorials or guides in written form, a video tutorial is a multimedia presentation that requires specific tools to create, edit, and publish.

outcome-schedule-social-posts.description: When the desired outcome is to schedule posts to publish in advance across multiple social channels.

outcome-social-listening-alerts.description: When the desired outcome is to set up alerts for brand mentions across multiple channels.

outcome-provide-community-support.description: When the desired outcome is to provide technical support to a community through open forums, discussion boards, or other community management tools.
